com.xmljson.converters

Interface XMLJSONConverterI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XMLJSONConverter

    public interface XMLJSONConverterI
    This interface provides methods that are required for creating a converter from XML to JSON.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void convertJSONtoXML(java.io.File json, java.io.File xml)
      Reads in the JSON from the given file and outputs the data, converted to XML, to the given file.

    • Method Detail

      • convertJSONtoXML

        void convertJSONtoXML(java.io.File json,
                      java.io.File xml)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Reads in the JSON from the given file and outputs the data, converted to XML, to the given file. Exceptions are thrown by this method so that the caller can clean up the before exiting.
        Parameters:
        json - File from which to read JSON data.
        xml - File from which to write XML data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
